2023.title: ROS 2
2023.description: Open-source middleware framework for developing and controlling robots with modular nodes, real-time support, and cross-platform compatibility.

2023.title: NVIDIA Isaac Sim
2023.description: Simulation platform built on Omniverse for training and testing robots in photorealistic, physics-accurate virtual environments.

2023.title: CoppeliaSim
2023.description: Comprehensive robot simulator supporting remote APIs, ROS integration, and multi-robot environments.

2023.title: Gazebo Classic
2023.description: Popular open-source robot simulator for testing algorithms in dynamic environments with realistic physics.

2023.title: ABB RobotStudio
2023.description: Offline programming and 3D simulation tool for ABB industrial robots used for programming, optimization, and testing.

2023.title: NVIDIA Jetson Nano
2023.description: Compact AI computing platform for deploying real-time computer vision and robotics applications at the edge.
